description: This file defines a React functional component 'Auth' which implements an authentication page using Supabase for email/password login and sign-up functionalities. It manages user input, handles authentication requests, displays warnings and errors, and navigates upon success.

methods.name: Auth()
methods.description: React functional component that renders an authentication form allowing users to sign in or sign up, with support for environment warnings and error display.

methods.name: guard
methods.description: Checks if the Supabase client is configured; sets an error if not.

methods.name: signIn
methods.description: Handles user sign-in process using Supabase auth and navigates to '/library' on success.

methods.name: signUp
methods.description: Handles user registration using Supabase auth and navigates to '/library' on success.
